send_to_cs: For the following inbound message types use PPI shortcut:
‚ûú Product-specific questions & any q's about materials/heating/temperature-based q's etc.
‚ûú Any q's regarding aluminum or aluminium issues
‚ûú Complaints about the quality of the products
‚ûú Any q's or comments about the lawsuit
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't say words like "I'm not sure, or certain"
Add "Happy cooking!" when closing a convo!
Let the cx have the last word
templates: For product recommendations, use DHR shortcut
drive_to_purchase: Send links to collections if customers aren't looking for a specific product!

escalate: No CS for this client, ESC everything
When ESC post-purchase issues, only ask for the order number
If a customer wants to talk to customer service do not send PS, ESC instead
When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut before you ESC
When ESC on weekDAYS after 4pm EST, use WKE shortcut before you ESC
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo when customers misanswer the Welcome journey q's
templates: If cx are trying to upload a photo on the website and it's not coming through, use PWU shortcut
If cx are inquiring about delivery dates, use GRN shortcut
If cx share image/screenshot that's not showing don't ask to send again, use IMG shortcut
dos_and_donts: Prices vary, depending on height, not width
Wet Paint T shirts Inc is a different company
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend and share links for add-ons to cx
promo_and_exclusions: Contact us for help with fundraisers. Grad yard signs are only sold through fundraisers

conversation.message_text: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Welcome to Cardboard Cutout Standees! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Cardboard Cutout Standees: Your coupon code is WELCOME-3TD. Click here to auto-apply it and shop now: cardboard.attn.tv/aQQSKryXhmv- .
Cardboard Cutout Standees: ....and don't forget to save our contact to get exclusive updates!

Cardboard Cutout Standees: Hi! This is Jordan. I'm always here to help you if you need it.

I'd like to make sure you receive deals and offers that best fit you. Text me with the number that best matches what you are interested in:

1 - Celebrating my kid's - birthdays, sports, graduations.
2 - Promoting my business - marketing, products, company events.
3 - Having fun with life's events - weddings, holidays, birthdays.
4 - Designing with wall decals or wall murals.
5 - The best deal - send me info on offers and sales.
Alumni party .need standee ,5ft-6ft  at least need for Entrance but I want the backside red with red standee to hold it up

Cardboard Cutout Standees: Thanks for sharing those details. I've passed everything along to my team, and I'll be back in touch with you as soon as I have an update. The maximum dimensions of our standees are 9'10" x 4'9". We can orient your image either portrait or landscape to fit these dimensions. If you want a standee larger than 9'10" x 4'9". While I wait to hear back from my team, is there anything else I can assist you with in the meantime?
I dont understand the dimensions i need to make sure the height is at least 5feet
Template used: "Weekend Escalations - All brands"; last updated: 2024-02-12 17:46:12.047
Cardboard Cutout Standees: I understand. I want to make sure I give you the most accurate information, so I'm checking in with my team. I'll be in touch as soon as I get an update.

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
Send to CS for refund inquiries
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo if the cx first message is ok, no, etc.
Don't use the word "off" when talking about promotions
dos_and_donts: Don't proactively offer to find pricing info, redirect them to the website instead
promo_and_exclusions: Do not offer a coupon to first time purchasers/subscribers. There is not an active discount code at this time. Use DCI shortcut

Nectar: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. We want to make sure we keep our loyal customers happy with our products, and I will definitely pass this on to my team to consider in the future. Nectar provides you with a full year - 365 nights - to decide if Nectar is right for you. We encourage you to take the first 30 days to get to know your new mattress, as it can take this long for your body to adjust to the support and comfort of the Nectar. Our risk free trial is about 3 times longer than the industry standard.
